title: Ticket #2309: 32bit schedd crashing repeatedly, 64bit schedd works ok
description:
Says Igor:

Over the weekend our Condor 7.6.0 32bit schedd started crashing. At first once every couple hours, then every few minutes!

We had about 10k jobs running and another 10k idle in that period.

I then tried to upgrade to 7.6.1 (still 32bit), and the schedd would still keep crashing.

I then went with 7.6.1 64bit, and that seemed to solve the problem. I.e. it was not crashing anymore.

Now, I don't know how to have you reproduce the problem. Since this was happening on a production system, the first priority was to get the system back in shape, so there was little debugging performed.

RUST ticket includes sample of emails I received from the Master. The first and the last crash in the series are included. Hope this helps you somehow. Else, at least you know this can happen.
